summary: In 2019, close to 40,000 people died from a gun injury in the U.S., and about twice that number suffered nonfatal injuries. There is no complete information on the health care costs of gun injuries. However, we found: Hospital costs for initial gun injury care were just over $1 billion a year, according to hospital data from 2016 and 2017 (the latest available) Costs associated...
title: Firearm Injuries: Health Care Service Needs and Costs
